Carmelo Anthony scored 29 points, Allen Iverson added 28 and the Denver Nuggets spoiled the return of Kevin Garnett , holding on for a 124-118 victory over the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night. Winning this game puts a lot of pressure on us, because if you can beat a team like this, then you can beat all the other teams, Allen Iverson said.`` We have enough talent to scare some people, but we just have to bring it night in and night out.'' The Nuggets even beat the Celtics at full strength-- kind of.

`` This has been the heart of the problem in Detroit,'' said Sergio Marchionne , who also heads up Fiat, the Italian auto company. Alan Mulally said Ford has learned that it has to deal with the current reality. You have to match production to real demand and accelerate development of new products that people will want to buy. For Ford that meant going with a plan for massive restructuring to a consortium of banks and borrowing$ 23.5 billion, he said. For GM and Chrysler it meant bankruptcy filings and huge bailouts

Sergey Brin will concentrate on developing new products.
